snippet.title: Blade Runner PC Game Trailer
snippet.description: This is a trailer for the PC game 'Blade Runner' developed by Westwood Studios and released back in 1997 by Virgin Interactive Entertainment. It was an Adventure game with great graphics, sound and well animated environments that really captured the mood of the film perfectly. I especially liked using the ESPER machine to scan photos for clues. The only bits I didn't like about the game were the occasional shooting sections which felt more like an afterthought, aiming and shooting felt a bit twitchy. It had multiple endings depending on how you played the game.
